item.title: How Capital Starved Companies Upgrade Technology
item.description:
Even with the economy recovering, securing funds for new technology can be challenging for businesses. Instead of traditional financing, consider “hosted solutions” or renting technology. This approach avoids large capital investments, allowing businesses to upgrade their systems affordably. Website hosting is a prime example. Initially, hosting your website on your servers made sense. However, with increased competition, affordable hosting services have become widely available, making it more practical to outsource this function...
